docs.lead_paragraph: The drug letrozole reduces the chances that a woman’s breast cancer will return and improves her odds of survival to a greater degree than tamoxifen, a study shows.

headline.seo: Letrozole Surpasses Tamoxifen at Reducing Breast Cancer Recurrence
headline.main: Regimens: Better Blocker of Breast Cancer Recurrence
headline.print_headline: Regimens: Better Blocker of Breast Cancer Recurrence

docs.abstract: Analysis in journal The Lancet Oncology finds breast cancer drug letrozole reduces the chances that a woman's cancer will return and improves her odds of survival to a greater degree than tamoxifen, a widely used estrogen blocker.
docs.snippet: The drug letrozole reduces the chances that a woman’s breast cancer will return and improves her odds of survival to a greater degree than tamoxifen, a study shows.

docs.lead_paragraph: Improvements in blood sugar control have resulted in an average increase of more than 15 years in life expectancy for people with Type 1 diabetes.

headline.seo: More Ways to Cope With Type 1 Diabetes and Low Blood Sugar
headline.main: More Ways to Cope With Type 1 Diabetes
headline.print_headline: More Ways to Cope With Type 1 Diabetes

docs.abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column notes improvements in blood sugar control have resulted in an average increase of more than 15 years in life expectancy for people with Type 1 diabetes.
docs.snippet: Improvements in blood sugar control have resulted in an average increase of more than 15 years in life expectancy for people with Type 1 diabetes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Whether they add heft to a salad, top a deep green bruschetta or play a starring role supported by a zesty tomato sauce, poached eggs are an easy and satisfying way to dine solo.

headline.seo: Dinner for One: Poached Eggs and Vegetables — Recipes for Health
headline.main: Dinner for One: Poached Eggs and Vegetables

docs.snippet: Whether they add heft to a salad, top a deep green bruschetta or play a starring role supported by a zesty tomato sauce, poached eggs are an easy and satisfying way to dine solo.
